title: Randi Rhodes Show - November 20 2013
description:
November 20, 2013
The Randi Rhodes Show 


Tea Party Congressman Trey Radel (R-FL) has been charged with possession of cocaine. Get out of Congress, loser! Go to CanadaÃ¢â‚¬â€where people like you belong! I guess thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s because not a lot of GOP Congressmen are applying for food stamps. Oh, Radel was also fined $250. For buying 3.5 grams of cocaine? George Zimmerman is free on bail. That announcement should be made from loudspeaker trucks all over Florida, for public safety. One of the conditions the judge set for the bail is that Zimmerman cannot have any guns or ammunition. IsnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t that cruel and unusual punishment? How is supposed to be able to breathe?

On CNN, Erin Burnett pressured Rand Paul to admit that Obamacare was a success in Kentucky. ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no way Rand Paul could deny it and still tell the truth, so he didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢tÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ tell the truth, that is. Paul claimed that the number of people Ã¢â‚¬Å“being cancelled dwarfs the number actually signing up.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ What he didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t mentioned is that the people being cancelled are getting better and cheaper plans. Saying that people in Kentucky are having their insurance cancelled is like saying that people who find jobs are being denied unemployment! TheyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re getting something better, Rand!
